====Usage notes====
* Cantonese {{lang|zh|嚟}} is the direct equivalent of Modern Standard Chinese's {{zh-l|來}}, but there are some fixed phrases where {{lang|zh|來}} cannot be substituted with {{lang|zh|嚟}}. For example, {{zh-l|出來}} is equivalent to {{zh-l|出嚟}} but {{zh-l|原來如此}} cannot become *{{lang|zh|原嚟如此}}.
